content: Stud holder X-SH F3 M6-1/4 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening ### FEATURES:Features Stay adaptable - stud holders can be changed to adjust to various different stud diameters Save time and labor – Stud fusion accessories help complete your stud fusion kit for faster and safer stud fusion that can be performed by non-specialist, trained operators Applications Fastening to steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) for higher tensile loads or thinner base materials, and preserving the base material integrity Steel fastening in wind, oil and gas offshore/onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2257273 - Stud holder X-SH F3 M6-1/4 - Package Size 5 pc
